Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: Here's what you need to know from today's news media coverage. Firstly; the Reserve Bank is considering a rate rise but only once inflation and wage growth rise. Secondly the National Disability Insurance Scheme requires reforms to meet participants' needs adequately. Thirdly investors should beware of the rally in housing and retail stocks as the Central Bank may raise the rates twice this year. Lastly the upcoming May budget should prioritize making Australia's energy supply stronger instead of tax increases.
